content.raw:
I am so sorry! but I added another commit regarding giving an error message for the non-existing link. The original code checked both link and light, and the new one checks them separately.

[https://bitbucket.org/tidota/gazebo/commits/6f04d5f20826ce3695472e5510e8a56ca4cec450?at=gazebo9](https://bitbucket.org/tidota/gazebo/commits/6f04d5f20826ce3695472e5510e8a56ca4cec450?at=gazebo9)
